extendedIngredients.name: turkey neck
extendedIngredients.original: Turkey giblets and neck from 1 (12-pound) turkey
extendedIngredients.originalName: Turkey giblets and neck from 1 turkey

extendedIngredients.name: turkey wings
extendedIngredients.original: 3 pounds turkey wings, cut into 2-inch pieces

title: Homemade Turkey Broth
summary: Homemade Turkey Broth might be just the main course you are searching for. This recipe serves 7 and costs 70 cents per serving. One serving contains 1243 calories, 155g of protein, and 64g of fat. 1 person has tried and liked this recipe. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free, dairy free, and whole 30 diet. Head to the store and pick up turkey giblets and neck from 1 turkey, celery, water, and a few other things to make it today. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 85%. This score is awesome. Try Homemade Corn Broth, Homemade Chicken Broth, and Homemade Vegetable Broth for similar recipes.
instructions: Heat oil in a large Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Add turkey wings, giblets, and neck; saut 15 minutes or until well browned. Cover and reduce heat to low; cook 5 minutes. Stir in onion and celery; cover and cook 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add 8 cups water; bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer 30 minutes. Strain broth through a fine sieve into a large bowl; discard solids. Cool to room temperature. Cover and chill 8 hours or overnight. Skim solidified fat from surface of broth; discard.

steps.step: Heat oil in a large Dutch oven over medium-high heat.
Add turkey wings, giblets, and neck; saut 15 minutes or until well browned. Cover and reduce heat to low; cook 5 minutes. Stir in onion and celery; cover and cook 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.

Add 8 cups water; bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer 30 minutes. Strain broth through a fine sieve into a large bowl; discard solids. Cool to room temperature. Cover and chill 8 hours or overnight. Skim solidified fat from surface of broth; discard.
